channel.description: Recent content in MongoDB module on Pip.Services Docs

item.title: Toolkit_api: Build
item.description:
Classes

DefaultMongoDbFactory

Creates MongoDb components by their descriptors.

item.title: Toolkit_api: Connect
item.description:
Classes

MongoDbConnection

MongoDB connection using the official driver.

MongoDbConnectionResolver

Helper class that resolves MongoDB connection and credential parameters, validates them and generates a connection URI. It is able to process multiple connections to MongoDB cluster nodes.

item.title: Toolkit_api: Persistence
item.description:
Classes

IdentifiableMongoDbPersistence

Abstract persistence component that stores data in MongoDB and implements a number of CRUD operations over data items with unique ids. The data items must implement the IIdentifiable interface.

MongoDbPersistence

Abstract persistence component that stores data in MongoDB using the official driver. This is the most basic persistence component that is only able to store data items of any type. Specific CRUD operations over the data items must be implemented in child classes by accessing this._database or this._collection properties.

PartitionMongoDbPersistence

Abstract persistence component that stores data in MongoDB and implements a number of CRUD operations over data items with partitionKey.
